original_title: What's in the Bible? Volume 5: Israel Gets a King
overview: Volume 5 Israel Gets a King contains two 25-minute episodes:  The People Want a King! covers 1 Samuel and the life of Saul as Israelâ€™s first king.  Kings Make Mistakes Too! covers 2 Samuel and the first chapter of 1 Kings, including the reigns of King David and his son, King Solomon.
title: What's in the Bible? Volume 5: Israel Gets a King
